product.name: 1" X 20' PVC SCH 40 Pipe - Belled End
product.productOverview: Pipe; Nominal Pipe Size 1"; Schedule 40 S; Thickness 0.133"; Length 20'; End Connection Belled x Belled; Material PVC; Material Specification ASTM D1784/D1785; Finish White; Pressure Rating 450 PSI at 73 Deg F; Temperature Rating 140 Deg F; Application Drinking Water System; Applicable Standard NSF 14/61; Warranty 5 Year Limited
product.featuresAndBenefits: PVC Schedule 40 is Highly Durable, With High Tensile and Impact Strength; It is Easy to Install and has Better Sound Deadening Qualities than PVC Schedule 40 DWV Foam Core; Installation Requires the Use of Primer and Solvent Cement; For Pressure Applications, Sharply Angeled Pressure Fittings Must be Used; 5 Year Limited Warranty
